participant_1.background:
I recently left my job after three years to travel the world.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
my favorite food is salad.
My parents were immigrants from Italy.

participant_2.background:
My brother and I have been close since childhood, and we bond over our shared love of music.
i love all of my beautiful children.
i always put my left sock on first.
i have none to share my thoughts about the books i read.
i run track.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hey, doing well. What about you?
I'm great! My parents are immigrants from Italy and I grew up in a small town in the Midwest. I love to travel the world and recently left my job after three years to do just that.
That sounds exciting! I've never been out of the country before. I have a brother who I'm close with and we love music. We used to play in a band together. I also run track and love to read.
That's so cool! I have a lot of siblings and we're close, too. I'm not much of a runner, but I love to read. I've read so many books that I have no one to share my thoughts about them with.
I know what you mean! I love talking about books with people, but I don't have anyone to do that with either.
Maybe we can be reading buddies! I love meeting new people and I'm always up for a good book recommendation.
That would be great! I love meeting new people too. We can exchange books and talk about them.
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited to get to know you better
